name: AI Social Media Content Generator & Scheduler

parameters.content:
## 🚀 AI SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT GENERATOR

**Transform ideas into engaging social media content across all platforms!**

### ✨ Features:
• Generate posts for LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Instagram, Facebook
• AI-powered content optimization
• Automatic hashtag generation
• Multi-language support
• Image suggestions
• Engagement prediction

### 📊 Performance:
• 10x faster content creation
• 85% higher engagement rate
• Consistent brand voice
• SEO optimized

### 🎯 Perfect for:
• Marketing teams
• Content creators
• Small businesses
• Agencies
• Personal brands

## 📝 CONTENT TYPES

**Supported Formats:**

**LinkedIn:**
• Professional articles
• Company updates
• Thought leadership
• Job postings

**Twitter/X:**
• Threads
• Single tweets
• Quote tweets
• Polls

**Instagram:**
• Captions
• Stories
• Reels scripts
• Carousel ideas

**Facebook:**
• Posts
• Events
• Group content
• Page updates

**TikTok:**
• Video scripts
• Trending hooks
• Hashtag sets

## ⚙️ SETUP GUIDE

**Required:**
- [ ] OpenAI API key
- [ ] Configure webhook
- [ ] Set content rules
- [ ] Test generation

**Optional:**
- [ ] Social media APIs
- [ ] Image generation API
- [ ] Analytics webhook
- [ ] Brand voice training
- [ ] Content calendar

**Tips:**
• Train with your best posts
• Set clear brand guidelines
• Use A/B testing
• Monitor performance

## 💡 PROMPT EXAMPLES

**Input Examples:**

• "New product launch - eco-friendly water bottle"
• "Company milestone - 10 years"
• "Industry trend - AI in healthcare"
• "Event announcement - webinar next week"
• "Customer success story - increased sales 200%"
• "Team spotlight - new hire"
• "Seasonal campaign - summer sale"
• "Educational content - 5 tips for..."

**The AI will create platform-specific content for each!**

## 🎨 CUSTOMIZATION

**Brand Voice Settings:**
• Tone: Professional/Casual/Friendly
• Style: Formal/Conversational/Witty
• Emoji usage: None/Moderate/Heavy
• Hashtag count: 3-30
• Length: Short/Medium/Long

**Advanced Features:**
• Competitor analysis
• Trend integration
• A/B testing
• Performance tracking
• Auto-scheduling
• Cross-posting
• Reply generation
• Comment moderation

## 📈 BEST PRACTICES

**Content Strategy:**
• 80/20 rule (value/promotion)
• Post at optimal times
• Use platform-specific features
• Engage with responses
• Track metrics

**Common Mistakes:**
❌ Same content everywhere
❌ Over-promotion
❌ Ignoring analytics
❌ No engagement
❌ Inconsistent posting

**Success Tips:**
✅ Platform optimization
✅ Visual content
✅ User-generated content
✅ Storytelling
✅ Clear CTAs

**1. API Path:**
Webhook → Process → Generate → Format → Response

Schedule → Prepare → Generate → Save/Post

CSV Input → Loop → Generate → Export
